Whenever you open Poink, you\'ll see this green screen.The centre circle is used to start/stop Poink…
Once Poink is switched on, it starts running in the background…
You can continue with other things, but keep holding the phone upright…
When you start falling asleep, the phone in your hand tilts.\nPoink senses this and starts alerting you till you hold the phone upright again.
Thats it! You are ready to use Poink now.\n\nMake sure to use Poink in a stable environment where no harm can occur to the phone or any person.
I just found a useful app that helps me stay awake, whenever Iam trying to avoid falling asleep.\n\nIt\'s called Poink.
